name: English
title: Penguin Player
description: A modular web music player for embedding

what.title: What can it do
what.content: This is a web music player, it's simple and easy to use. For example, you can use it through only ONE JavaScript file. Also, it's a modular player, you can customize it in many ways.

features.title: Features
features.content:
• Mobile / touch support
  • Simple, beautiful & powerful
  • Easy to use
  • Modular
  • Written in TypeScript

simple.title: Simple
simple.introduce: To begin with, you can use it in a simple way.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.introduce: Or, if you want more customize space, you can use it in a more advanced way.
